2025-05-07.title: Tesla’s China Sales Drop Again as Rival BYD Posts Gains
2025-05-07.description: Tesla Inc.’s China-made shipments declined for a seventh consecutive month, exacerbating a slump in the electric vehicle maker’s global sales.

2025-05-07.title: Musk’s xAI to Use Tesla Batteries at Memphis Supercomputer
2025-05-07.description: Elon Musk’s xAI is using Tesla Inc.’s Megapack batteries to shore up its “Colossus” supercomputer in Memphis, another example of the overlapping interests between Musk’s companies.

2025-05-09.title: Tesla Supplier Panasonic to Slash 10,000 Jobs in Big Overhaul
2025-05-09.description: Panasonic Holdings Corp. is slashing headcount by 10,000, or more than 4%, part of a push to cull non-growth operations and boost profitability.
